physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Physical and neurologic examinations were normal.
Reduced maximum workload and reduced oxygen uptake were noted during an exercise test. Baseline plasma lactate values were 1.0 to 2.2 mmol/L.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The exercise test findings indicate impaired energy metabolism.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Muscle biopsy showed widespread subsarcolemmal accumulation of mitochondria (SSAM), with more than 5% of muscle fibers affected.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Indicates a hallmark of mitochondrial disorder, but the specific progression over time is not detailed.
